637380.name: DC Universe Online™ - Episode 28: Age of Justice
637380.description:
Travel back in time to Europe circa 1944 where multiple timelines are merging and unraveling. Rip Hunter has identified the most fragile point – 1940s World War II – and now some of the most classic heroes and villains of the DC Universe are racing back in time to protect or rewrite history, including Wonder Woman, Per Degaton, the Justice Society of America, and the high-flying Blackhawks! Age of Justice features two new open world areas, an Alert, an Operation, and two Raids (both with Elite versions!). Earn all-new feats, collections, and gear inspired by the Blackhawks! Age of Justice is free to access for Members or available for purchase in the in-game Marketplace.
• Travel back in time to the Golden Age era
• All-new maps: War-Torn Village and Baron Von Savage’s Stronghold
• Four New Instances and Two Open World Areas: 4-player Alert, 4-player Operation, two 8-player Raids (with Elite Raids)
• New Blackhawks-inspired gear, war-themed base items, Feats, and More!

Min CR 186
